name: mm-icon
description: A set of MediaMath's commonly used icons.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: the width of the icon in pixels

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: the height of the icon in pixels

attributes.name: primaryColor
attributes.description: The hex value to color the icon

attributes.name: hoverColor
attributes.description: The hex value to color the icon upon hover

properties.name: width
properties.description: the width of the icon in pixels

properties.name: height
properties.description: the height of the icon in pixels

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of icon to display. values are identical to the type html attribute.

properties.name: primaryColor
properties.description: The hex value to color the icon

properties.name: hoverColor
properties.description: The hex value to color the icon upon hover
